entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Otherwise clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
